pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: [Symphony Space presents] Wall to Wall [sound recording] : Aaron Copland and Americana : Celebrating the 80th birthday of Aaron Copland.
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: This is a live 13 hour broadcast (10 A. M.-11 P. M.) of the [7th] Wall to Wall at Symphony Space, celebrating Aaron Copland's 80th birthday, with a mix of Copland's compositions and other works by American composers; WNYC radio host was unidentified. Special guest appearences: Ruth Ford, John Ashbery, [Margaret Jory] (ASCAP), Maureen Stapleton, [Edward Albee], and Pearl Lang.
